short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take care of your eyes day and night using dark theme for Front tools and services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark Mode for Front gives you a fast and straightforward way to change the look of the Front app to dark. Prevent your eyes from straining with our free, customizable extension. 

FEATURES
Dark skin 
Contrast and brightness adjustment
Night shift

DARK SKIN
Works with all parts of the Front app. You can adjust the brightness and contrast of lights and colors to your liking. 

NIGHT SHIFT
When on, inverts the blue light that comes from the computer screen to warm. Night shift helps to protect the eyes as well as reduce the harmful effect of blue light on sleep.  

HOW THE EXTENSION WORKS
Just install the app, and youâ€™re ready to go. No need to sign up or sign in Front app to activate the extension.
